title: invalid argument 2: out of range for Sparse matrix cuda() function
body_html:
torch.sparse.LongTensor(torch.Size((1, 2, 3))).cuda()

raises an error:

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
RuntimeError                              Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-170-910f9c37ab21> in <module>()
----> 1 sparse_zeros((1, 2, 3)).cuda()

/home/zhukov/anaconda3/envs/torch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_utils.py in _cuda(self, device, async)
     61             indices = self._indices().cuda(device, async)
     62             values = self._values().cuda(device, async)
---> 63             return new_type(indices, values, self.size())
     64         else:
     65             new_type = getattr(torch.cuda, self.__class__.__name__)

RuntimeError: invalid argument 2: out of range at /opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1503970438496/work/torch/lib/THC/generic/THCTensor.c:23
